thread.title: BRIEF-Zoo Digital Group Says CFO Helen Gilder To Leave Company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zoo Digital Group Says CFO Helen Gilder To Leave Company

organizations.name: brief-zoo digital group says cfo helen gilder to leave company

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Zoo Digital Group Plc:
* ANNOUNCES THAT HELEN GILDER, COMPANYâ€˜S CHIEF FINANCE OFFICER CFO, WILL BE LEAVING COMPANY
* HELEN WILL CONTINUE AS CFO AND DIRECTOR FOR NEXT 6 MONTHS TO ENSURE AN ORDERLY HANDOVER TO HER SUCCESSOR
* COMPANY HAS BEGUN A PROCESS TO IDENTIFY AND RECRUIT HELEN SUCCESSOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
